DOC.brief_summary: Study investigate bioequivalence 10 mg tablet ( test drug ) 10 mg capsule ( reference drug ) meloxicam ( UHAC 62 XX ) 7-day administration .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study UHAC62XX Tablets Compared With Capsules Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Age > = 20 < = 35 year Weight : Body Mass Index > = 18.5 < 25 Subjects judge investigator appropriate subject study base result screen test Subjects volunteer participate able fully understand agree study write informed consent History gastrointestinal ulcer surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) History hypersensitivity UHAC 62 XX and/or salicylate ( aspirin etc . ) and/or Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) History aspirin induce asthma ( bronchial asthma induce NSAIDs ) History bleed tendency History alcohol drug abuse Participation another trial investigational drug within 4 month prior trial Whole blood donation 400 ml within 3 month prior trial Whole blood donation 100 ml within 1 month prior trial Donation constituent blood 400 ml within 1 month prior trial Any medication might influence result trial within 10 day prior trial Excessive physical activity within 7 day prior trial Alcohol drinking within 3 day prior trial History orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts Other , judged investigator inappropriate subject study
